amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Opportunity Grant Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Nebraska Opportunity Grant Fund is created. Money in the fund shall include amounts transferred pursuant to section 79-3501 from the State Lottery Operation Trust Fund or, until June 30, 2024, the Nebraska Education Improvement Fund. All amounts accruing to the Nebraska Opportunity Grant Fund shall be used to carry out the Nebraska Opportunity Grant Act. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
